title: JSON Web Token Contents
description: Claims contained within JSON Web Token

iss.description: The DNS name of the Authorization Server issuing the token

sub.description: The unique identifier assigned to the end-user by the user authorization system

aud.description: The fully qualified domain name of the intended recipient (Resource Server), or a domain name containing wild-card characters

exp.description: The UTC time at which the token expires

iat.description: The UTC time at which the token was issued

client_id.description: The client identifier of the OAuth 2.0 client that requested the token

scope.description: A string containing a space-separated list of scopes associated with the token

x-nmos-api.description: An object containing the access permissions of the user for the listed NMOS APIs
